page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The changing scene in Northampton is as prominent in the area covered by this survey as any other.The Development Cor poration is now disbanded but the chang es continue.The area is divided in two by the River Nene which has always had an important influence on the town.Even today the residents of St.James End and Cotton End(both in this area)hardly ever meet or want to meet;they are fore igners to each other.Important landmark s have sprung up recently-the Grosvenor Centre,Northampton House,Barclaycard, the Express Lifts Tower(Northampton's Lighthouse)and the Derngate Centre.The population has expanded from 100000 to 150000 in this decade,and is expected to reach 200000 by the end of this cent ury.the population structure is changin g too becoming more cosmopolitain with several ethnic and national groups repr esented from all over the world.*******
